q: The trust includes Barts in the City, the Royal London in Whitechapel and The London Chest hospital in Bethnal Green. The announcement came after a review of every aspect of the trust's expenditure to ensure it is truly essential and represents best value, said a spokesman. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
